original_text: Therefore thou shalt set thy face toward the siege of Jerusalem, and thine arm shall be uncovered, and thou shalt prophesy against it.
korean_text: 너는 또 네 얼굴을 에워싸인 예루살렘 쪽으로 향하고 팔을 걷어 올리고 예언하라

sentences.original_text: Therefore thou shalt set thy face toward the siege of Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 너는 네 얼굴을 예루살렘 포위쪽으로 향하게 할지니라

sentences.original_text: and thine arm shall be uncovered
and thou shalt prophesy against it
